name: Burgundy Country Retreat
description:
DESCRIPTION
Welcome to our beautiful reception venue, the ideal location for your wedding, located just 1h30 from Paris. It is in this old 12th century farm that we invite you to welcome you for your wedding.
You will have your ceremony in the main courtyard, your cocktail reception on the merry-go-round, your dinner and dancing evening under the frame of our barn protected as a Historic Monument.
With a gorgeous rustic and chic style, we offer a splendid reception room for your wedding breakfast as well as the main courtyard for your cocktail party.
We also can accommodate 30 guests on site in our boutique bedrooms.
We offer you the complete privatization of the estate with its two-hectare park to organize your event in a romantic and authentic setting.
The estate is located at the gates of Burgundy , 1h30 south of Paris . We are near the A5 motorway and 20km from the train station for your guests coming by train. In addition, Troyes and its historic city center is close by away.
As soon as you enter the estate, you enter our two-hectare park which will be the ideal setting for your ceremony. Behind the majestic porch door you can organize your reception with all the facilities and style you need for an unforgettable event.
Then you will discover the 350 m2 reception room which is located in a medieval barn which dates back to the 12th century. The magnificent frame where the beautiful intertwining garlands will create a rural and authentic atmosphere. We can cater for up to 250 guests for a seated dinner.
We offer plenty of flexibility and you pick a caterer of your choice and there is no curfew, meaning that the dance party can last until dawn!
Our two lodgings include 30 places to accommodate your loved ones . You will take magnificent photos of your preparations in the suite of the newlyweds which has been decorated with care.
Take advantage of our swimming pool and its terrace to organize the nicest of brunches! Are you looking for a brilliant way to end this weekend in the countryside? Background music, children having fun in the water, a pretty view and of course a caterer who will know how to delight you.
Accommodation:
Our two independent gites were completely renovated in 2021. This allows 30 people to stay on site in the greatest comfort.
A total of 10 rooms including a superb bridal suite to spend an unforgettable moment in the middle of the countryside. 6 bathrooms with showers and bathtubs and two fully equipped kitchens are at your disposal.
Several facilities such as a TV room and a 5-seater jacuzzi located inside the cottage and are also present for your entertainment and well-being.
For the outdoors, a 2-hectare park awaits you with its heated swimming pool if you wish.
Prices start from 7900 for weekend privatisation.
additional_info:
